data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Idukki, Kerala, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Idukki, Kerala, India
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Idukki, Kerala, India to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the 12,199 believers find a person of peace today among the 1,096,801 lost neighbors around them. And help them start discovery bible studies in these unbelieving homes.
data.verse: Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor. Send to Joppa for Simon who is called Peter. He is a guest in the home of Simon the tanner, who lives by the sea.’ So I sent for you immediately, and it was good of you to come. Now we are all here in the presence of God to listen to everything the Lord has commanded you to tell us.”

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Idukki to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Brahmin Potti people. 0.0% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Jesus, teach the local leaders in Idukki, Kerala, India to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.prayer: Father, you desire the people in the county of Idukki who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Idukki, Kerala, India know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

location.name: Idukki
